definitions: (of a loan) made to finance a particular project, with the condition that the project's profits are the only assets out of which the borrower is legally obliged to repay the loan.
shortDefinitions: made to finance project, with condition that profits are only assets out of which borrower repays loan

definitions: (of debt) secured by property or other collateral, with the borrower not being personally liable for further compensation if the debt is not repaid.
shortDefinitions: secured by property, with borrower not being personally liable for further compensation
